answers.answer: I failed the one hour test but passed the 3 hour
In my last pregnancy, I failed the 1 hour and passed the other with flying colors! Good luck!
Hopefully I'll get same results! Thanks I can relax a bit now
I failed the 1hr. Just went for the 3hr today
i failed both.  dont stress about either way. easily managed and no complications if well monitored. hope you pass!
Failed my 3hr test but just slightly. Only have 9wks left but the way I look at it, this pushes me to get healthy now and I shouldn't have much of an issue staying this way after the baby
I skipped the 1 hour test because I had sugar in my urine 2 consecutive times. I passed with no issues the 3 hours test even though I started my pregnancy with insulin resistance.

question: Anybody developed gestational diabetes??? I'm freaking out I failed 1hr test and now have to take a 3hr test.
title: 3hr test/27 weeks
